Class DemoDifficulty

java.lang.Object
difficulty.DemoDifficulty
All Implemented Interfaces:
DifficultyStrategy
public class DemoDifficulty extends Object implements DifficultyStrategy
Week 12-02: Demo Difficulty Strategy (for testing/demo purposes) âœ… SOLUTION: Implements DifficultyStrategy interface Demo Settings (Very Easy): - Spawn Interval: 5.0 seconds (very slow) - Initial Obstacles: 1 spike only - Enemy Types: Only spikes (no goblins/wolves) - Boss: Only uses DEFEND (guaranteed to lose) Perfect for: - Testing game flow without dying - Demonstrating battle mechanics - Quick playthroughs
